mapper.sql: itemID, itemCode, ORG_CODE, USERNAME, PASSWORD, SALT, NAME, GENDER, IDCARD_TYPE, IDCARD_NO, EMAIL, STATE, CONTACTS, mobilePhone, CITYID, TYPE
u.USERNAME, u.NAME, u.GENDER, u.IDCARD_TYPE, u.IDCARD_NO, u.EMAIL, u.CONTACTS, u.mobilePhone, u.CITYID, u.CREATER, u.itemCreateAt
mapper.select:
SELECT
,
,r.ROLE_NAME FROM user u,role r WHERE u.TYPE IN(8,21) AND u.TYPE=r.ROLE_TYPE order by u.itemUpdateAt desc

SELECT
,
,r.ROLE_NAME FROM user u,role r WHERE u.TYPE=7 AND u.TYPE=r.ROLE_TYPE AND u.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=CHAR} order by u.itemUpdateAt desc

SELECT
,u.itemCode,
,r.ROLE_NAME FROM user u,role r WHERE u.TYPE IN(25,26) AND u.TYPE=r.ROLE_TYPE order by u.itemUpdateAt desc

select
,
from user where USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by itemUpdateAt desc limit 1

select
,
from user where mobilePhone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by itemUpdateAt desc

update user
